title: BannerShake - Skills Banner Generator
bannerShakeDesc: BannerShake is a tool that allows you to generate your own banner from your technical skills.

feedback.title: Feedback
feedback.text:
You can't find a technology or a skill in the list? You want to make a return or suggest an evolution?

Please specify it in the comment box below
feedback.successMsg: Your message was sent successfully! Thanks for your contributions!
feedback.errorMsg: An error occurred when sending mail! Please retry later

howItWorks.title: How it works?
howItWorks.step1: First, select the skills you want to highlight.
howItWorks.step2: You can even add an image of your choice which will be displayed on the left side of the banner. By doing this, you reduce the number of skills in your banner.
howItWorks.step3: Then, choose the size of the skills logos and the background color. The number of skills displayed depends on the size you choose.
howItWorks.example1: For example, an old project that I did, called Wafood, was done with

copyMsg: You have copied the URL allowing you to regenerate your skill banner effortlessly
logosOffscreenAlert1: You have selected too many skills. Reduce your selection or change the size of the logos
logosOffscreenAlert2: {logosOffscreen} will not be displayed in the banner
html5CanvasUnsupportedErrorMsg: Your browser does not support the HTML5 canvas tag.
